page_blocks.web_template_values: {"title":"Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)","align":"Left","items":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"How do I create a new client in the system?","content":"You can create a new client by providing their address, business category, and VAT details through the client creation feature."},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"What happens after I create an Estimate/Quotation?","content":"After creating an Estimate/Quotation, the system automatically lists down all relevant services based on the client's business category."},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","title":"How can I generate a Sales Order for an approved Estimate?","content":"Once the client approves the Estimate, you can generate a Sales Order with a simple click using the \"Get Items Form\" button."},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","title":"What steps are involved in marking a job as completed?","content":"To mark a job as completed, ensure service approval and receipt of necessary licenses, then update the system with the Approved and Expiry dates."},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","title":"How does the Reminder feature work?","content":"The Reminder feature automatically updates upon job completion and sends email and message notifications to both the client and user as the expiry date approaches."},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 6","title":"How do I generate a Sales Invoice after completing a job?","content":"Upon job completion, you can easily generate a Sales Invoice for the client through the system."},{"idx":7,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 7","title":"How do I record payments received from clients?","content":"You can update payment entries in the system upon receiving payments for Sales Invoices."},{"idx":8,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 8","title":"Why are reminders sent again after job completion?","content":"The system sends reminders again to ensure continuous control over impending deadlines and prevent any missed deadlines for both clients and users."}]}

{"title":"Introduction","subtitle":"Welcome to the future of PRO service management with Bizbee's innovative PRO System. Designed specifically for PRO Dubai Company, our software streamlines every aspect of PRO operations. From effortless tracking of expiry dates to seamless handling of accounts, our powerful reminder system ensures deadlines are never missed. Say goodbye to manual processes and hello to efficiency as our user-friendly interface simplifies PRO tasks for both companies and clients alike. With real-time updates on service rates and comprehensive features tailored to your needs, embrace a new era of PRO service excellence with PRO System.","align":"Left"}

{"title":"Getting Started","subtitle":"Why Bizbee PRO?\nThe key difference in Bizbee PRO compared to other PRO software is its unparalleled simplicity and comprehensive functionality. While other solutions may offer fragmented features, Bizbee PRO stands out with its all-in-one platform that seamlessly integrates every aspect of PRO management. From intuitive user interfaces to powerful reminder systems, Bizbee PRO streamlines operations for both PRO companies and their clients. With real-time updates on service rates and automated compliance tracking, Bizbee PRO ensures efficiency and accuracy at every step. Experience the difference with Bizbee PRO, where simplicity meets innovation for unmatched PRO service excellence.","align":"Left"}
{"title":"Workflow","subtitle":"Streamline PRO service with precision and ease through a simple workflow, ensuring accuracy and control at every step.","align":"Left"}
